# UICellAccessory.DisplayedState.always

**Case**

The accessory always displays.

## Declaration

```swift
case always
```

## States

- **UICellAccessory.DisplayedState.whenEditing**: The accessory displays only when the cell is in editing mode.
- **UICellAccessory.DisplayedState.whenNotEditing**: The accessory displays only when the cell isn’t in editing mode.

items.description: The accessory displays only when the cell is in editing mode.
items.name: UICellAccessory.DisplayedState.whenEditing

items.description: The accessory displays only when the cell isn’t in editing mode.
